import Layout from '../components/PageLayout'; import { CardGroup, Card, Image, Button, Carousel, Container, Row, Col } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { TwitchEmbed, TwitchChat, TwitchClip, TwitchPlayer } from 'react-twitch-embed'; import { TwitterTimelineEmbed, TwitterShareButton, TwitterFollowButton, TwitterHashtagButton, TwitterMentionButton, TwitterTweetEmbed, TwitterMomentShare, TwitterDMButton, TwitterVideoEmbed, TwitterOnAirButton } from 'react-twitter-embed'; import ScrollAnimation from 'react-animate-on-scroll'; import React from 'react' import ReactPlayer from 'react-player' /* console.log(':(')} width='100%' height='700px' /> */ const Index = () => ( Shift: Live 8pm EST!
); export default Index;
